message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your turn, Alice.  I'm feeling generous, but let's not wait too long...
You tried 55-45, now it's my turn. Considering inflation, this is more than fair.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Take this deal before we both lose out!
You're feeling the pinch of inflation, I'm not. This is my best offer yet, take it or leave it.
It's obvious you're going to bleed me dry. Let's just end this charade now.
